reviews.review_msg: Not hard. Very understanding of students' level. Many of the exam q's exactly like assign. q's. Material not very organized, and ends up rushing through by the end of the course. Very helpful. Just do what he tells you to do, i.e. DO THE ASSIGNMENTS, LIKE, AT LEAST 3 TIMES, UNTIL YOU MASTER IT. You'll come out with at least B+ or A-, I believe.

If my memory serves me right, this course was brutal. Very hard. The course is now renamed PHYS 421 to better reflect the difficulty level. There are other profs who will make this course a little bit easier.
